001package org.relationlearn.util;
002
003import java.io.File;
004import java.util.Arrays;
005import java.util.Map;
006import org.relationlearn.classifiers.SVMClassifier;
007import org.relationlearn.filters.FilterGroup;
008import org.relationlearn.filters.SequentialFilterGroup;
009import org.relationlearn.model.ArgumentNode;
010import org.relationlearn.model.ArgumentRelation;
011import org.relationlearn.model.RelationDigraph;
012import org.relationlearn.util.io.DLVFileGenerator;
013import org.relationlearn.util.io.DOTFileGenerator;
014import org.relationlearn.util.io.InputParser;
015import org.relationlearn.util.io.OutputGenerator;
016import org.relationlearn.util.io.XMLFileGenerator;
017import org.relationlearn.util.io.XMLFileParser;
018import weka.core.Instances;
019
020/**
021 * Utility class used to classify graphs with already trained classifiers.
022 * 
023 * The call parameters are: &ltinput-file&gt &ltfilter-config-path&gt 
024 * &ltmodels-path&gt &ltout-format&gt &ltout-path&gt
025 * 
026 * @see weka.classifiers.functions.LibSVM
027 * 
028 */
029public class GraphClassifier {
030    
031    private static InputParser parser;
032    private static OutputGenerator oGenerator;
033    private static FilterGroup filters;
034    private static InstanceGenerator generator;
035    private static SVMClassifier classifier;
036    
037    private static File configFile;
038    private static File modelFile;
039    
040    private static Instances instances;
041    
042    private static String inputFile;
043    private static String baseConfigPath;
044    private static String modelsPath;
045    private static String outFormat;
046    private static String baseOutPath;
047    private static String[] svmOptions;
048    
049    private static final String attck = RelationType.ATTACK.toString();
050    private static final String suppt = RelationType.SUPPORT.toString();
051    
052    public static void main(String args[]) throws Exception {
053        if(args.length < 5) {
054            System.err.println("Error in parameters, usage: "
055                    + "<input-file.xml> <filter-config-path> <models-path> "
056                    + "<-dot|-xml|-dlv> <output-path> [<classifier-options>]");
057        } else {
058            inputFile = args[0];
059            baseConfigPath = args[1];
060            modelsPath = args[2];
061            outFormat = args[3];
062            baseOutPath = args[4];
063            if(args.length > 5) {
064                svmOptions = Arrays.copyOfRange(args, 5, args.length);
065            }
066            parser = new XMLFileParser();
067            Map<String, RelationDigraph> graphs = parser.parseInput(inputFile);
068            String gName, sResult;
069            double result;
070            int i;
071            ArgumentRelation relation;
072            for (Map.Entry<String, RelationDigraph> graph : graphs.entrySet()) {
073                gName = graph.getKey();
074                configFile = new File(baseConfigPath + gName + ".xml");
075                if (configFile.exists()) {
076                    filters = new SequentialFilterGroup(gName, configFile);
077                    filters.addClassAttribute(null);
078                    generator = new InstanceGenerator(
079                            graph.getValue(), filters);
080                    instances = generator.getGraphInstances();
081                    modelFile = new File(modelsPath + gName + ".model");
082                    if(modelFile.exists()) {
083                        classifier = new SVMClassifier(modelFile);
084                        if(args.length > 5) {
085                            classifier.setOptions(svmOptions);
086                        }
087                        i = 0;
088                        for(ArgumentNode node : graph.getValue()) {
089                            relation = node.getTargetRelation();
090                            if(relation != null) {
091                                instances.instance(i).setClassMissing();
092                                result = classifier.classifyInstance(
093                                        instances.instance(i));
094                                sResult = instances.classAttribute().value(
095                                        (int)result);
096                                if(attck.equals(sResult)) {
097                                    relation.changeRelationType(
098                                            RelationType.ATTACK);
099                                } else if(suppt.equals(sResult)) {
100                                    relation.changeRelationType(
101                                            RelationType.SUPPORT);
102                                } else {
103                                    relation.changeRelationType(
104                                            RelationType.UNKNOWN);
105                                }
106                                i++;
107                            }
108                        }
109                    } else {
110                        System.err.println("Error could not find " + modelFile 
111                                + " file for: " + gName);
112                    }
113                } else {
114                    System.err.println("Error could not find config file for: " +
115                            gName);
116                }
117            }
118            if (null != outFormat) {
119                switch (outFormat) {
120                    case "-dot":
121                        oGenerator = new DOTFileGenerator();
122                        oGenerator.generateOutput(graphs, baseOutPath);
123                        break;
124                    case "-xml":
125                        oGenerator = new XMLFileGenerator();
126                        oGenerator.generateOutput(
127                                graphs, baseOutPath + ".xml");
128                        break;
129                    case "-dlv":
130                        oGenerator = new DLVFileGenerator();
131                        oGenerator.generateOutput(graphs, baseOutPath);
132                        break;
133                    default:
134                        System.err.println("Error in output format specifier");
135                        System.exit(-1);
136                }
137            }
138        }
139    }
140
141}
